publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2386 Mr Gil Paterson: Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fundâ€”That the Parliament acknowledges the action of the Wallace Clan Trust in supporting the New York Fire Department Fund for emergency services and families of the disaster on 11 September 2001 by providing the Braveheart Claymore 911 for auction, which raised over $4,000, and notes that this gift was given in the name of Scotland along with a humanitarian message of support for the families.
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Michael Matheson*
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2386 Wallace Clan Contribution to New York Fire Department Fund (lodged on 30 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
